flavor: "So I'm fighting a monster. Not the worst way for a teenage girl to spend her Friday evening."
name: Ghost-Spider
text: Dizzying Reflexes - Response: After you resolve an "Interrupt" or "Response" ability on an event, ready Ghost-Spider. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "Time for the drum solo!"
name: Gwen Stacy
text: Action: Choose to either shuffle Ticket to the Multiverse from your discard pile into your deck or ready George Stacy. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "I thought you'd at least TRY to put a fight."-Ghost-Spider
name: Ghost Kick
text: Hero Response (attack): After Ghost-Spider uses a basic power, deal 6 damage to an enemy. (Max 1 per basic power use.)

name: Parental Guidance
text: Alter-Ego Action: - If George Stacy is in play, attach 1 event from your hand or discard pile facedown to George Stacy. - If George Stacy is not in play, search your deck and discard pile for him and add him to your hand. (Shuffle.)

flavor: "Life is most in-focus when the world is upside down."-Gwen Stacy
name: Phantom Flip
text: Hero Response (thwart): After Ghost-Spider uses a basic power, remove 5 threat from a scheme. (Max 1 per basic power use.)

name: Pirouette and Punch
text: Hero Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, deal damage to the villain equal to 1 more than the boost icons ([boost]) on that card. Cancel that card's "When Revealed" effects.

name: Web Binding
text: Requirement ([mental]). (While paying for this card, spend the listed resources.) Hero Interrupt: When an enemy would activate, cancel that activation. If a minion's activation was cancelled this way, deal 4 damage to that minion.

flavor: "Trust me, Ghost-Spider is not the problem."
name: George Stacy
text: Events attached to George Stacy may be played as if they were in your hand. Action: Exhaust George Stacy → attach 1 event from your hand facedown here (to a maximum of 3).

name: Ticket to the Multiverse
text: Action: Remove Ticket to the Multiverse from the game → discard your hand, shuffle your discard pile into your deck, draw up to your hand size, and ready each Ghost-Spider card you control.

flavor: "These should come in handy."-Gwen Stacy
name: Web-Bracelet
text: Hero Response: After you resolve an "Interrupt" or "Response" ability on an event, exhaust Web-Bracelet → draw 1 card. (Max 1 per event.)

flavor: "Maybe I am getting the hang of this superhero stuff."
name: Silk
text: Response: After you play Silk from your hand, if you control another [[Web-Warrior]] card, search the encounter deck for a treachery and discard it. (Shuffle.)

flavor: "Brooklyn doesn't like being run. We're wild like that."
name: Spider-Man
text: Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, stun and confuse an enemy if you control at least 3 [[Web-Warrior]] cards.

flavor: "People need protection and help, and we're the only ones who can do it."
name: Spider-UK
text: Interrupt: When Spider-UK defends against an attack, deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the number of [[Web-Warrior]] cards you control.

flavor: "Up high! Down low! Aww, too slow."-Ghost-Spider
name: Jump Flip
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 2 of that damage. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, remove 2 threat from the main scheme.

name: Return the Favor
text: Hero Action (attack): Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard a treachery. Reveal that treachery → deal 5 damage to the villain.

flavor: "When I get outta here, you're gonna get it!"
name: What Doesn't Kill Me
text: Requirement ([physical]) (While paying for this card, spend the listed resources.) Hero Action: Heal 2 damage from your hero → ready your hero.

name: Spider-Man
text: Play only if you control a [[Web-Warrior]] card. Interrupt: When Spider-Man leaves play, discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the villain equal to the number of boost icons ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: Across the Spider-Verse
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Exhaust a [[Web-Warrior]] card you control → search your discard pile for a [[Web-Warrior]] ally and put it into play, then choose a player. That player may spend 3 resources of any type to repeat this ability.

name: Young Love
text: Team-Up (Gwen Stacy and Miles Morales). Max 1 per deck. Alter-Ego Action: Heal 3 damage each from Gwen Stacy and Miles Morales.

name: Web of Life and Destiny
text: Ignore this card's resource cost if your identity has the [[Web-Warrior]] trait. Response: After a [[Web-Warrior]] ally leaves play, choose a player → that player draws 1 card.

name: Plan B
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Action: Exhaust Plan B and discard 1 random card from your hand → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Spider-Man
text: Venom Blast - Special: Deal 2 damage to an enemy. Stun that enemy. Spider Camouflage - Special: Give Spider-Man a tough status card. Confuse an enemy.

flavor: "Once you've leaped from skyscrapers and fought off bad guys, everything else is a chore."
name: Miles Morales
text: Response: After you change to this form, shuffle 1 Spider-Man card from your discard pile into your deck.

flavor: "I'm not above adding insult into injury." — Spider-Man
name: Arachnobatics
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If that enemy has a stun status card, deal 3 additional damage to it. If that enemy has a confuse status card, deal 3 additional damage to it.

flavor: "I didn't ask for this power, this...responsibility. But I won't let it go to waste." — Miles Morales
name: Double Life
text: Max 1 per round. Action: Change your form. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, ready your identity.

flavor: "I can see that you're not happy to see me... or not see me?" — Spider-Man
name: Swing In
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using a [mental] resource, resolve Spider-Man's "Spider Camouflage" ability.

flavor: "If that doesn't hold you, I know something that will." — Spider-Man
name: Web-Shot
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, resolve Spider-Man's "Venom Blast" ability.

flavor: "I'm the man in the chair."
name: Ganke Lee
text: Action: Exhaust Ganke Lee → draw 1 card. If you are in hero form, choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: "I'm not proud of my past, but I don't regret it either. It brought me where I am today."
name: Jefferson Davis
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Jefferson Davis → remove 1 threat from the scheme with the least threat.

name: Power Within
text: Hero Response: After your hero uses a basic power, discard Power Within → resolve Spider-Man's "Venom Blast" ability.

name: Defense Mechanism
text: Hero Response: After your hero uses a basic power, discard Defense Mechanism → resolve Spider-Man's "Spider Camouflage" ability.

name: Web-Shooter
text: Uses (3 web counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Hero Resource: Exhaust Web-Shooter and remove 1 web counter from it → generate a [wild] resource.

name: Monica Chang
text: Response: After Monica Chang enters play, search your deck, hand and discard pile for a copy of Surveillance Team support and put it into play. Place 1 snoop counter on each Surveillance Team you control.

flavor: "You're the A-team? Really? How far down the list do you think they were when they settled on you guys?"
name: Spider-Woman
text: Reduce the cost to play Spider-Woman by 1 for each confused enemy in play.

flavor: "This is now the jurisdiction of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement, and Logistics Division!"
name: Homeland Intervention
text: Action: Exhaust up to 3 [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] cards you control and choose a scheme → remove 2 threat from that scheme for each card exhausted this way.

name: Global Logistics
text: Action: Exhaust 1 [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] card you control → look at the top 4 cards of a player deck or the encounter deck. Discard any number of those, and put the others on the top and/or bottom of that deck in any order.

name: Field Agent
text: Uses (3 backup counters). Hero Interrupt: When a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] ally would take any amount of consequential damage, exhaust Field Agent and remove 1 backup counter from it → prevent 1 of that damage.

attack_text: Response: After Agent 13 attacks or thwarts, choose a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support → ready that support.
flavor: "I bear the scars of the past all over me. But there's more to me than that. I'm better now. Stronger. Wiser."
name: Agent 13
Dum Dum Dugan
text: Interrupt: When you use one of Dum Dum Dugan's basic powers, exhaust up to 3 [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] cards you control. For each card exhausted this way, Dum Dum Dugan gets +1 to that power for this use.

name: Ghost-Spider
text: Play only if you control a [[Web-Warrior]] card. Interrupt: When Ghost-Spider leaves play, search your deck for an identity-specific event and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

flavor: "See, Miles, that's how you do it."
name: Spider-Man
text: Requirement ([energy] [mental] [physical]). (While paying for this card, spend the listed resources.) Response: After Spider-Man attacks or thwarts, choose another [[Web-Warrior]] character → ready that character.

flavor: "I'll have my people contact your people."
name: Government Liaison
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Government Liaison → play a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] card from your hand, reducing its resource cost by 1.

flavor: "It's not often we deploy a Sky-Destroyer. But when we do, that's how you know the situation is about to get serious." — Nick Fury
name: Sky-Destroyer
text: Response: After you play a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] card, exhaust Sky-Destroyer → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Venom
text: Response: After you reveal an encounter card, deal 1 damage to Venom → deal damage to an enemy equal to the number of icons ([star] and [boost]) in that card's boost area.

name: Symbiote Suit
text:
Max 1 per deck.
Your identity gets +1 to each of its basic powers, +1 hand size, and +10 hit points.
